description: Updates a direct-query data source. For more information, see Working with Amazon OpenSearch Service data source integrations with Amazon S3.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the data source to modify.

parameters.name: DataSourceType
parameters.description: The type of data source. S3GlueDataCatalog (dict) --- An Amazon S3 data source. RoleArn (string) --- >The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the S3 Glue Data Catalog.

nested_params.name: RoleArn
nested_params.description: >The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the S3 Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message associated with the updated data source.
